Package imagingbook.pub.hough.lines

Class HoughLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines.AlgebraicLine
      • imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines.HessianLine
        • imagingbook.pub.hough.lines.HoughLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<HoughLine>
    public class HoughLine
extends HessianLine
implements java.lang.Comparable<HoughLine>
    This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class imagingbook.pub.geometry.lines.HessianLine

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance​(double x,
                          double y)
        Returns the perpendicular distance between this line and the point (x, y). The result may be positive or negative, depending on which side of the line (x, y) is located.
        Overrides:
        getDistance in class AlgebraicLine
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of point position.
        y - y-coordinate of point position.
        Returns:
        The perpendicular distance between this line and the point (x, y).

      • makeLine

        public ij.gui.PolygonRoi makeLine()
        Creates a vector line to be used an element in an ImageJ graphic overlay (see Overlay). The length of the displayed line is equivalent to the distance of the reference point (typically the image center) to the coordinate origin.
        Returns:
        the new line

      • makeLine

        public ij.gui.PolygonRoi makeLine​(double length)
        Creates a vector line to be used an element in an ImageJ graphic overlay (see Overlay). The length of the displayed line is measured from its center point (the point closest to the reference point) in both directions.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the line
        Returns:
        the new line
